old:
敵を倒し、物を造る
それが主に求められし私の務め
column2:
Defeating enemies and creating things.
That is primarily the duty demanded of me.

old:
《異界の狭間》はあまりに冷たく、そして静かだ
そこに長く居すぎたポーンが
己の存在意味を失ってしまうほどに
column2: The chasm between worlds is so cold and silent that a pawn who stays there too long loses the meaning of his existence.

old:
主が我々ポーンをどう見ているのか
それは、我々が考えても詮なきこと
column2: How does the master see us pawns? It is a matter beyond our understanding.
